works.title: AI DIKTI Platform
works.summary: Information platform for AI development in Indonesia with a repository feature for AI-related projects and datasets.
works.description: AI DIKTI is a web-based platform providing information, resources, and a repository for AI research and projects in Indonesia. It aims to support the academic and research community by offering curated content and a collaborative space similar to Kaggle (currently under development).
features: Latest news and articles about AI in Indonesia
Repository for AI projects and datasets (in development)
Responsive and modern UI with Styled Components

works.title: AI Center of Excellence Gunadarma
works.summary: A platform providing information and resources for AI research and development at Gunadarma University.
works.description: AI Center of Excellence Gunadarma is a web-based platform to facilitate collaboration, research, and dissemination of AI-related activities at Gunadarma University. It provides information on research, events, publications, and acts as a hub for AI enthusiasts in the academic community.
features: News and updates about AI research and activities
Repository for AI-related projects and publications

works.title: Therapeutic
works.summary: A healthcare application similar to Alodok, built with Laravel and React TypeScript.
works.description: Therapeutic is a healthcare platform providing online consultation and medical information, inspired by platforms like Alodok. It leverages Laravel for backend and React TypeScript for frontend development.

works.title: Workab
works.summary: An employee management system with attendance via geolocation and QR code, built with Laravel and React TypeScript.
works.description: Workab is an employee management platform that offers attendance tracking using radius/geolocation and QR codes, along with profit and loss calculations for businesses.
features: Attendance via geolocation and QR code

works.title: Sicawit
works.summary: A palm oil plantation management system for financial tracking, built with Laravel and React TypeScript.
works.description: Sicawit is a management system designed for palm oil plantations in Kalimantan, allowing users to track profits and losses daily, monthly, and yearly, including detailed expense records like fertilizer purchases per land area.
features: Profit and loss tracking by date/month/year

works.title: Dropship
works.summary: A dropshipping platform built using Next.js TypeScript and Go.
works.description: Dropship is an e-commerce platform facilitating dropshipping businesses, developed with Next.js TypeScript for frontend and Go for backend services.

works.title: Bastetiproject
works.summary: A landing page for a software house built using Next.js TypeScript.
works.description: Bastetiproject is a professional landing page designed to represent a software house, developed with Next.js TypeScript for modern and SEO-friendly performance.

works.title: Master Bagasi
works.summary: An e-commerce platform for a technology company, built with Next.js TypeScript and Laravel.
works.description: Master Bagasi is an e-commerce application developed for a technology company, combining Next.js TypeScript for the frontend and Laravel for the backend to ensure scalability and performance.

works.title: AI SaaS
works.summary: An AI-based SaaS platform offering various AI tools like ChatGPT, Image Generator, and more, built with Next.js TypeScript, Prisma, and GPT-3.5.
works.description: AI SaaS is a platform providing multiple AI-powered tools including conversational AI, image generation, NFT creation, music generation, video generation, and code generation. The platform is built using Next.js TypeScript, Prisma, and integrates OpenAI's GPT-3.5 API.
